title: Lekki Conservation Centre
address: KM 19, Lekki-Epe Expressway, Lekki Peninsula, Lagos
description: A large urban nature park with canopy walkways, picnic areas, and wildlife viewing.

title: Nike Art Gallery
address: No. 2, Elegushi Road, 3rd Roundabout, Epe Expressway, Lekki, Lagos
description: One of the largest art galleries in West Africa, featuring Nigerian and African art.

title: National Museum Lagos
description: A museum with a rich collection of Nigerian artifacts and historical exhibits.

title: Freedom Park Lagos
description: A memorial and leisure park on the site of a former colonial prison, now hosting events and concerts.

title: Tarkwa Bay Beach
description: A sheltered beach popular for swimming, water sports, and relaxation.

title: Eko Atlantic City
description: A new coastal city being built on reclaimed land, offering modern business and residential spaces.

title: Omenka Gallery
description: A contemporary art gallery showcasing Nigerian and international artists.

title: Terra Kulture
address: 1376 Tiamiyu Savage St, Victoria Island, Lagos
description: A cultural center with art exhibitions, theater, and a restaurant serving Nigerian cuisine.
